tipeeestream.donation.new: Thank you very much (name) for the tip of (amount)(currency)!
tipeeestream.donation.newreward: Thank you very much (name) for the tip of $(amount) (currency)! Here are (points) (pointname)!
tipeeestream.donations.announce.disable: Tips will no longer be announced.
tipeeestream.donations.reward.usage: Usage: !tipeeestream rewardmultiplier n.n  Set to 0 to disable
tipeeestream.donations.reward.success: The reward for tips has been set to $1 $2 per whole amount of currency donated.
tipeeestream.donations.message.no-name: A (name) tag was not provided, at a minimum provide the (name) tag. Tags: (name) (amount) (currency) (message)
tipeeestream.donations.rewardmessage.no-: A (name) tag was not provided, at a minimum provide the (name) tag. Tags: (name) (amount) (currency) (reward) (message)
tipeeestream.donations.message.success: Updated the message for tips when rewards are disabled.
tipeeestream.donations.rewardmessage.suc: Updated the message for tips with rewards enabled.
tipeeestream.enabled.donators: The donators group has been enabled.
tipeeestream.disabled.donators: The donators group has been disabled.
tipeeestream.donators.min: The minimum before being promoted to a Donator was set to $1
